mod.description: Requires a Galaxy Reset for best experience. Tweaks how solar systems generate to make a realistic distribution of worlds, and increases the amount of worlds per system. Special variants of the mod exist to further define system generation.

component.description: Default version of the mod. Adjusts planet counts to realistic levels by increasing the maximum amount of planets in a star system to 11, adjusting the likelihood of moons, gas giants, and rings, and reducing spawns of High T-Score planets! This is the closest this mod gets to a Vanilla+ Experience!
Same as Vanilla+, but the size of the Grox has been severely reduced.
Same as Vanilla+, but the size of the Grox has been even further reduced.
A Special Variation of the mod that swaps around the values for easter-egg planets and barren planets, making those easter eggs extremely common (Severely OP).
A Variation of the mod where you took ages to evolve and as such life is extremely abundant, completely changes how you approach Space Stage. Makes Empires Very Common
A Variation of the mod where life is extremely sparse, completely changes how you approach Space Stage. Makes Empires Rare
A Variation of the mod where you were amongst the first to evolve, completely changes how you approach Space Stage. Makes Empires Exceedingly Rare (Extremely Difficult)
